title: Virginia Tech announces 2022 softball gameday experience elements - VT hokiesports.com
content: Virginia Tech announces 2022 softball gameday experience elements  VT hokiesports.com
description: BLACKSBURG – With only three weeks left until Virginia Tech softball returns to Tech Softball Park, the Virginia Tech athletic department would like to announce the array of gameday experience elements that fans can expect when attending softball games at TSP during the 2022 Season.
